data.name: loadComponentMaxRetriesError
data.value: Attempted to load component "{0}" ({1}) {2} times without success.
data.comment: {Locked}An error to show when a component fails to load after retrying the maximum amount of times allowed. {0} is the component id, {1} is the component alias, {2} is the maximum number of times.

data.name: manifestNotFoundError
data.value: Manifest not found for component id "{0}" and version "{1}".
data.comment: {Locked}An error to show when the manifest could not be found. {0} is the component id, {1} is the component version.
